Line height that is less than 150% of the computed element font size limits content readability for people with dyslexia, low vision, cognitive impairments or learning disabilities. Opening a new window or new tab unexpectedly can cause confusion for users, particularly for blind users and those with low vision, cogntive impairments or learning disabilities.. Avoid opening links in new windows or tabs. If it is unavoidable, give the user warning via text or a properly marked up and appropriate icon.
